# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. Reference message reported that State and Defense have allocated $4 million FMS for Bolivia in FY 1974.
2. We have been informed by GOB Sub-Secretary of Defense that President Banzer has accepted $4 million credit under the terms indicated in Para. 2 of Reftel.
3. Bolivian Ambassador in Washington will be instructed to sign FMS credit agreement on behalf of Bolivian government.
STEDMAN
